ygData.subject: Re: The War of Decay
ygData.msgSnippet: The info about the leaders of certain defenses is, of course, only on that particular server. If you are on the Lanys T`Vyl server, and wish to join us
ygData.messageBody:
The info about the leaders of certain defenses
is, of course, only on that particular
server.<br><br>If you are on the Lanys T`Vyl server, and wish to
join us in defending our homes against the forces of
darkness, please contact myself or one of the following
people for more info:<br><br>Rugen Payne <Ordo Ursi
Prismatus><br>Darkas Dusk <Equus Bravium><br><br>Or check the
War Council board at
<a href=http://pub72.ezboard.com/blanyswarcouncil target=new>http://pub72.ezboard.com/blanyswarcouncil</a><br><br>We are still seeking generals for the defense of a
few cities. Freeport, Qeynos, Kaladim, Felwithe, and
Kelethin all have commanders, but we still are in need of
stout defenders for EVERY city.<br><br>Thank ye, and
good hunting.<br><br>Tyral Stormfang<br>Commander of
the Knights of Prophecy<br>General of
Kelethin<br>Lanys T`Vyl
